description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the reason for the child being withdrawn from the National Child Measurement Programme.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Excluded from national child measurement programme as child absent from school
Excluded from national child measurement programme as child declined measurement
Excluded from national child measurement programme as parent opted out
Excluded from national child measurement programme as child no longer at school
Excluded from national child measurement programme as awaiting consent
Excluded from national child measurement programme for other reason
Excluded from national child measurement programme (finding)
Excluded from national child measurement programme as unable to stand unaided for measurement (finding)
Unable or unwilling to comply due to cognitive impairment
